name: International Trade Union Confederation
headAddress: Boulevard du Roi Albert II, Bte 1, 5
goal: The ITUC’s primary mission is the promotion and defence of workers’ rights and interests, through international cooperation between trade unions, global campaigning and advocacy within the major global institutions.
interests: Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: trade, employment, social policy, environment, competition, external affairs, development, budget
